page.title: 15Peoples Concerns in 1985
page.content: There are several things that people in{Woodsetts}are concerned about in 1985.One of them is{terrorism}because an American TWA plane was hijacked from Athens airport and taken to Lebanon. After 17 days the American hostages were released.We are also concerned about the{famine in {Africa.}Some ladies in Woodsetts have been knitting blankets and sending them to{Ethiopia.}At school we had a jumble sale and all the money went to Ethiopia.People are also thinking about{football}problems because a stand at Bradford was burned down by a cigarette.Most people were shocked because they saw it happen live on TV.Then when Liverpool played Juventas in Brussels Liverpool fans started a riot.The USA and USSR are the 2 superpowers.USA and USSR have the same amount of{nuclear weapons.
